title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yoghurt and spices
Grill the chicken until cooked thoroughly
Cook the tomatoes and cream together to make a sauce.
Mix grilled chicken with the sauce and serve.
